headline: Applied Materials (AMAT) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Share Price Gains
summary: Applied Materials stock snapshot after recent gains Applied Materials (AMAT) has attracted fresh attention after recent share price strength, with the stock up about 23% over the past month and roughly 39% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Applied Materials. That recent 30 day share price return of 22.5%, on top of a 39.4% gain over 90 days, sits against a 1 year total shareholder return of 68.8%. headline: Applied Materials to Report Fiscal First Quarter 2026 Results on Feb. 12, 2026
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Materials, Inc. today announced that it will hold its fiscal first quarter 2026 earnings conference call on Thursday, Feb. 12, 2026, at 4:30 p.m. ET / 1:30 p.m. PT. The call will be webcast live at: https://ir.appliedmaterials.com. A replay will be available on the same day beginning at 8:00 p.m. ET / 5:00 p.m. PT. About Applied MaterialsApplied Materials, Inc. headline: 1 Reason to Sell AMAT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: The past six months have been a windfall for Applied Materials’s shareholders. The company’s stock price has jumped 74.6%, hitting $326.79 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
